sentences.english: We have been struck by lightning, the rear fuselage damaged, right elevator lost.
sentences.chinese: 我们遭到雷击，后机身被打坏，失去右升降舵。

sentences.english: So the main causes for OPGW strand breakage form lightning are the structural design problems.
sentences.chinese: 因此，OPGW雷击断股的主要原因是结构设计问题。

sentences.english: Lightning disturbance threats the security of weak current equipments in power system seriously.
sentences.chinese: 雷击严重威胁着电力系统中弱电设备的安全运行。

sentences.english: His house was struck by lightning last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚他的房子被雷击了。

sentences.english: He looks as if (as though) he had been hit by lighting.
sentences.chinese: 他那样子就像被雷击了似的。

sentences.english: The right to water heard such as lightning, home received a wedding invitation to Guo Jiaji.
sentences.chinese: 权水闻言如遭雷击，回到家里收到了郭家寄来的喜贴。

sentences.english: Officials have said lightning may have played a part in the accident.
sentences.chinese: 有官员说，雷击可能也是引发事故的原因之一。

sentences.english: Just as a timepiece stops in a house that is stricken by lightning.
sentences.chinese: 就像被雷击中的房子里一只座钟停止了走动。

sentences.english: Lighting may have been the cause, he said.
sentences.chinese: 他回答说，原因可能是遭到了雷击。

sentences.english: Installing those devices also doesn't shield a high-speed train system completely from lightning jolts.
sentences.chinese: 安装这些设备也不能完全防止高速铁路系统避免雷击。

sentences.english: This thesis takes the lightning accident in ZiJin Temple of Suzhou as an example.
sentences.chinese: 本文以苏州紫金庵遭雷击事故为案例。

sentences.english: Computer network power source and signal circuit's against thunder stroke protection.
sentences.chinese: 计算机网络电源和信号线路的防雷击保护。

sentences.english: Carmona province and two died in lightning strikes.
sentences.chinese: 卡莫纳省有2人死于雷击。

sentences.english: The total lightning outage rate is closer to the the practical running result.
sentences.chinese: 计人感应雷击计算的总跳闸次数更接近实际运行值。

sentences.english: Describing my feeling, upon seeing it, as thunderstruck would be an understatement.
sentences.chinese: 如果要说我当时的感受，说是被雷击了都不过分。

definition: to inflict heavy losses/to inflict serious damage
to destroy in an explosion/to break (by bombing)
